author: PTI
title: RBI measures to boost liquidity, incentivise banks to lend more to boost economy: Finance Minister
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that to ease the worries of MSMEs that are in danger of becoming NPA accounts, it has now been decided that the NPA classification norms will exclude the 3-month moratorium window that banks are allowed to give on loan…
content: NEW DELHI: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Friday said the RBI has taken a slew of steps to maintain adequate liquidity in the system, incentivise bank credit flows, ease financial stress and enable normal functioning of markets, following difficulties… [+3487 chars]
